titles.title: Authorizing and directing the Committee on the Judiciary to inquire whether the House should impeach G. Thomas Porteous, a judge of the United States District Court for the Eastern District of Louisiana.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Ms. Slaughter asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

bill.summary: 9/17/2008--Passed House without amendment. Directs the Committee on the Judiciary to inquire whether the House of Representatives should impeach G. Thomas Porteous, a judge of the United States Court for the Eastern District of Louisiana.
